projects.project_name: Canal repair (Preaek Beak nad Preaek Kapaav)

ProjectSummary.Location: [ 80405 ] Kandal \ Kaoh Thum \ Kaoh Thum Kha
ProjectSummary.Name: Canal repair (Preaek Beak nad Preaek Kapaav)
ProjectSummary.Objective: Year 2009, people of two villages will have enough water consumption.

Outputs_Estimated_Cost.Description: Unlined Earth canal Repair [ 1020101 ]Dimension #1 : 2.000 Depth (m)Dimension #2 : 6.000 Average width (m)

Evironmental_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require environment study.
Evironmental_Safeguard.Reason: The project is not located in environment watchlist, wetland, national park, and ancient temple.

Land_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require land acquisition report.Public
Land_Safeguard.Reason: The project will be implemented in the existing large canal, without any plants/farming, and project will not be expanded.

Highland_Safeguard.Impact: This project did not require highland people report.
Highland_Safeguard.Reason: The project location is not in the region of highland people living.
